verbose_text: Zheng et al. [XREF_BIBR] showed that in C2C12 mouse myoblast cells, indoxyl sulfate inhibited myoblast differentiation, induced the myotubular atrophy marker atrogin-1 protein expression, and may alter levels of XBP-1, a transcription factor and a key component of the ER stress response.
evidence: levels of XBP-1, a transcription factor and a key component of the ER
